title: Executive Order 5718-Revocation of Withdrawals of Public Lands for Classification, California
content: The withdrawal made by Executive Order No. 4331 of October 28, 1925, of lot 6 sec. 6, lots 1 and 2 sec. 7, T. 7 N., R. 1 E., Humboldt meridian, California, is hereby revoked, and the withdrawal made by Executive Order No. 5237 of December 10, 1929, is also hereby revoked in so far as it affects the above-described lands.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5718-Revocation of Withdrawals of Public Lands for Classification, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361296
